hsk.p1: 大家反映了不少管理过程中出现的问题

hsk.p1: 不管什么时间，也不管什么节目

hsk.p2: No matter what time, no matter what program

hsk.p2: As long as you turn on the TV

hsk.py: Làngfèi wǒ de shíjiān.

hsk.py: Bù è jiù bùyào chī zǎofàn
hsk.p2: Don't eat breakfast if you are not hungry

hsk.py: Nǚ péngyǒu tīngguò zhège xiàohuà.

hsk.p1: 研究证明，人们的心情会随着天气的变化而变化
